committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Housing and Community Development

official_title: To provide for the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development to make grants for economic development activities in connection with loan guarantees under section 108 of the Housing and Community Development Act of 1974 to enhance the security of such loans and improve the viability of projects financed with such loans, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Community Enterprise Revitalization Amendments Act - Amends the Housing and Community Development Act of 1974 to authorize the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development to make economic development grants to enhance the security of housing loan guarantees under section 108 of such Act. Authorizes such grants' funding with recaptured urban development action grant (UDAG) amounts. Authorizes a UDAG amnesty program. Authorizes the Secretary to guarantee section 108-backed obligations.

titles.title: To provide for the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development to make grants for economic development activities in connection with loan guarantees under section 108 of the Housing and Community Development Act of 1974 to enhance the security of such loans and improve the viability of projects financed with such loans, and for other purposes.
